What's Kraken?

Kraken is one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges by trading volume. It offers a comprehensive platform for trading various cryptocurrencies, including spot trading, futures, options, and more.
The platform is known for its:

  • High liquidity and trading volume
  • Wide range of supported cryptocurrencies
  • Advanced trading features
  • Robust API for automated trading

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials.' %}

1 Create a Kraken Account

Sign up for a Kraken account if you don't have one. Sign up here.

2 Access API Management

  1. Log in to your Kraken Pro account
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner
  3. Select "Settings" from the dropdown menu
  4. Navigate to the "Connections & API" tab

3 Create API Key

  1. Click "Create API Key"
  2. Give your API key a descriptive name.
  3. Set permissions to "Query Funds" and "Orders and trades".
  4. Enable IP address restriction and add our server's IP address: {{ server_ip }}
  5. Click "Generate Key"
  6. Make sure to copy and securely store your API Key and Secret Key as they will be shown only once.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Kraken account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
